data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Roma needs to be cautious. Cagliari have an attacking throw-in.
Marco Di Bello awards the away team a throw-in.
Justin Kluivert (Roma) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Marco Di Bello.
Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Cagliari Roma drive forward through Henrikh Mkhitaryan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Roma.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
Roma drives forward and Nikola Kalinic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Roma.
Roma's Federico Fazio attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Marco Di Bello awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Cengiz Under of Roma gets in a strike, but is off target.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan gets his shot on target but fails to score for Roma.
Nikola Kalinic (Roma) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Marco Di Bello.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
Cagliari drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick Roma.
Bruno Peres of Roma smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Roma.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
Free kick for Roma in the half of Cagliari.
Roma advance rapidly upfield but Marco Di Bello blows for offside.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Marco Di Bello.
Luca Pellegrini for Cagliari drives towards goal at Sardegna Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Roma.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cagliari.
Roma to take a throw-in in Cagliari territory.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Alberto Paloschi (Cagliari) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Marco Di Bello signals a Cagliari throw-in in Roma's half.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roma have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Roma are coming forward and Bruno Peres gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Marco Di Bello awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Cagliari's Luca Pellegrini gets in a shot on goal at Sardegna Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Can Cagliari capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Roma's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cagliari.
Cagliari take a 1-0 lead thanks to Joao Pedro.
That's a fine assist from Christian Oliva.
Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
Goal! Nikola Kalinic (Roma) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
In Cagliari a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cengiz Under (Roma) gets a yellow card.
Joao Pedro for Cagliari has been booked by Marco Di Bello and receives a first yellow card.
Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Roma.
Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Cagliari.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Marco Di Bello.
Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
Marco Di Bello signals a throw-in for Cagliari, close to Roma's area.
Cagliari have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Goal! Nikola Kalinic gives Roma a 1-2 lead.
Great play from Henrikh Mkhitaryan to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Roma at Sardegna Arena.
Corner awarded to Roma.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Roma.
Throw-in for Roma in the half of Cagliari.
The first half has been concluded at Sardegna Arena.
The second-half is now underway.
Marco Di Bello signals a Cagliari throw-in in Roma's half.
Marco Di Bello signals a Cagliari throw-in in Roma's half.
Free kick for Cagliari in the half of Roma.
Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Roma.
Throw-in high up the field for Roma in Cagliari.
Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Cagliari a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Marco Di Bello.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Justin Kluivert hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Roma.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
Goal kick for Roma at Sardegna Arena.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cagliari.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Sardegna Arena, Gonzalo Villar has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in Roma.
Aleksandar Kolarov (Roma) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Marco Di Bello awards the away team a throw-in.
Roma are pushing forward but Justin Kluivert's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
In Cagliari, Cagliari push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Cagliari's Radja Nainggolan is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal! Roma extend their lead to 1-3 through Justin Kluivert.
Nikola Kalinic with an assist there.
Robin Olsen is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The home team have replaced Artur Ionita with Gaston Pereiro. This is the first substitution made today by Rolando Maran.
Robin Olsen is back on his feet again.
Giovanni Simeone is on a sub for Alberto Paloschi for Cagliari.
Throw-in for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Roma in Cagliari.
Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Roma just outside Cagliari's area.
Giovanni Simeone (Cagliari) has received a yellow card from Marco Di Bello.
Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Can Cagliari get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Free kick Cagliari.
Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Roma's Bruno Peres breaks free at Sardegna Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
Roma drive upfield and Cengiz Under gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Goal! Gaston Pereiro pulls one back for Cagliari to make it 2-3.
Radja Nainggolan instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
Carles Perez is replacing Cengiz Under for Roma at Sardegna Arena.
Justin Kluivert gets his shot on target but fails to score for Roma.
Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Cagliari.
Marco Di Bello awards Roma a goal kick.
Justin Kluivert is booked for the away team.
Marco Di Bello awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Roma capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Cagliari's Luca Pellegrini has been booked in Cagliari.
Goal! Aleksandar Kolarov extends Roma's lead to 2-4.
In Cagliari a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Cagliari are whistled for offside.
Paulo Fonseca (Roma) is making a second substitution, with Davide Santon replacing Bruno Peres.
Paulo Fonseca is making the team's third substitution at Sardegna Arena with Jordan Veretout replacing Justin Kluivert.
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
An attacking Cagliari player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Marco Di Bello awards Cagliari a penalty but Joao Pedro misses from 12 yards.
Goal for Cagliari! They are now just 3-4 behind thanks to a Joao Pedro header.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marco Di Bello awards Roma a goal kick.
Free kick Roma.
Roma's Nikola Kalinic has run offside.
Giovanni Simeone for the home team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Free kick for Roma in the half of Cagliari.
Can Cagliari get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
It's 3-4 as the referee blows for full-time.
Daniele Ragatzu is replacing Marko Rog for the home team.
Pau Lopez (Roma) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Davide Santon (Roma) has received a yellow card from Marco Di Bello.
Daniele Ragatzu (Cagliari) has received a first yellow card.
